snippet: The state news agency said 30 people died in the Saturday attack, but a security official and a medical official said that 45 people were killed.
abstract: Death toll from a suicide bombing in southern Yemen rises to 45 people, in the latest attack against militias allied with the army; bomber is suspected of being a member of Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: The state news agency said 30 people died in the Saturday attack, but a security official and a medical official said that 45 people were killed.

headline.main: Toll of Suicide Attack Rises to 45 in Yemen
headline.print_headline: Toll of Suicide Attack Rises to 45 in Yemen
